title: Pedagogical Approaches to Enhance Elementary Mathematics Creativity Using Mobile Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A course for pre-/in-service elementary teachers to learn integrating creative elements in math instruction using smartphones. Conducted in a limited-technology environment centered on smartphones without PCs.

learning_goals: Explain three creative thinking strategies for solving math problems using mobile apps
Design student-centered math activity plans using smartphone-based collaborative tools
Propose one or more process-oriented assessment methods through mobile technology

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
